general.description: Facett Nest is little more than a local police station. It was created as a precaution against the pirate threat coming from Khaas, but the Soromid know that no single station could withstand a coordinated attack. Facett is mostly a visible sign of Soromid presence in Hatter. It puts the local population at ease. The real security has to come from Hartwell Station in the neighbouring system of Father's Pride.
general.bar: The bar is where the local security employees go when they're on standby. They seldom have to wait for a long time before their assistance is required.
